General.Name: Y.H. Dimri Construction & Development Ltd
General.Description: Y.H. Dimri Construction & Development Ltd operates as a real estate company in Israel, Romania, and the Czech Republic. The company plans, develops, and constructs residential, commercial, industrial, and hotel projects, as well as urban renewal projects. It also engages in sells, purchases, manages, and rents commerce, offices, student residences, and hotels. The company was incorporated in 1989 and is based in Netivot, Israel.
